department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of a drive on docking system
description: The drive on docking system is intended to permanent warehousing in the at Naval Communication Station Quadra undergoing(COMEX>F GW Protector grun updates; restore voting compliance " Ordinary Item
full_summary:
#  W0133-24T027 Drive on Dock Request for Proposal

## Notice Information
Date published: August 31, 2023
Deadline for submission: October 11, 2023 at 2:00 PM ET
Contract duration: Expected start date - October 19, 2024

## Unexpected Changes
The government has made three amendments to this contract from its initial posting.

## Contract Overview
The Canadian government's Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the delivery of a drive on dock to HMCS Quadra in Comox, British Columbia. 

## Required Documents
* Statement of Work
* Supporting documentation, if required
* Letter of Intent, specifying all information related to commercial vehicles and prices

## Terms and Conditions
Bid responses must be prepared in accordance with  Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canadian procurement regulations.

## Review Process
All submissions will be evaluated based on both price and technical merit. Proposals must be submitted through the provided web portal. Upon submission, pertinent requirements will be discussed during Documentary Draft issued.



## Contact 
Inquiries should be directed to:

Patrick Wass
[patrick.wass@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.wass@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Deputy Director 
A Two-Stage Evaluation with re-assessment of bidder qualifications
(SPAC-PSPC)

 ##Procedures in Question 
The governing regulations suggest that the presupposition of the lowest price is the most favorable one.
